  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103270</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103270</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Application de miroirs</string>
            <string language="en">Application of mirrors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anwendung der Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aplicação dos espelhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Applicazione degli specchi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εφαρμογή των καθρεφτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aplicación de espejos</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que des miroirs placés à une intersection sur une route nationale permettent à des voitures de voir d'autres voitures qui ne sont pas dans leur ligne de mire.  Ceci pourrait réduire des accidents de la route.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that mirrors placed in a high-way intersection allow cars to see other cars which are not in their line of sight. This could reduce road accidents.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">voitures</string>
            <string language="en">Cars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">route nationale</string>
            <string language="en">high-way</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle d'incidence</string>
            <string language="en">incidence angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayon</string>
            <string language="en">ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">angle refléchi</string>
            <string language="en">reflected angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Spiegel, die in 
einen Datenbahndurchschnitt gelegt werden, Autos andere Autos sehen 
lassen, welche nicht in ihrer geometrischen Sicht sind. Dieses 
konnte Verkehrsunfälle verringern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os espelhos colocados
em uma interseção da estrada permitem que os carros v outros carros 
quais não estão em sua linha de vista. Isto podia reduzir 
acidentes de estrada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che gli specchi 
disposti in un'intersezione della strada principale permettono che gli
automobili vedano altri automobili quale non sono nella loro riga di 
vista. Ciò ha potuto ridurre gli incidenti stradali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι καθρέφτες που 
τοποθετούνται σε μια διατομή εθνικών οδών επιτρέπουν στα 
αυτοκίνητα για να δουν άλλα αυτοκίνητα που δεν είναι 
στη γραμμή θέας τους. Αυτό θα μπορούσε να μειώσει τα 
τροχαία ατυχήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que los espejos 
colocados en una intersección de la carretera permiten que los coches
vean otros coches cuáles no están en su línea de la vista. 
Esto podía reducir accidentes de camino.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Autos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Datenbahn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdehnung Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
